description: Marriage with prenuptial agreement - protects pre-marriage assets

divorce_conditions.description: 90-day cooling off period before divorce finalization

custom_clauses: All assets owned prior to marriage remain separate property
Assets acquired during marriage are subject to negotiated split
Gifts and inheritances during marriage remain separate property

notes: Prenuptial terms are hashed and stored on-chain
Full prenup document should be sealed separately using private-batch
90-day cooling period before divorce can be finalized
Consider using 'anubis-notary seal' for private financial terms
example_usage: anubis-notary marriage init --template prenup --parties "Alice,Bob" --jurisdiction US-NY -o marriage.json --terms prenup-terms.json
